com.facebook.buck.util.autosparse

Interface AutoSparseState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HgAutoSparseState

    public interface AutoSparseState
    Track the state of a source control working copy, including what files could potentially be part of a full checkout, and control the working copy sparse profile (what part of the full set of files under source control are actually physically present on disk).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToSparseProfile(Path path)
      Add a path that should, at some point in the future, be part of the working copy sparse profile.
      boolean existsInManifest(Path path)
      Query if a file is available in the source control manifest (and is thus tracked by source control)
      ManifestInfo getManifestInfoForFile(Path path)
      Query the source control manifest for information on a file.
      Path getSCRoot() 
      void materialiseSparseProfile()
      Update the working copy to include new paths added to the sparse profile.

    • Method Detail

      • getSCRoot

        Path getSCRoot()
        Returns:
        The root path of the working copy this state tracks.

      • getManifestInfoForFile

        @Nullable
ManifestInfo getManifestInfoForFile(Path path)
        Query the source control manifest for information on a file.
        Parameters:
        path - the file to get the manifest information for
        Returns:
        a ManifestInfo instance if this file is under source control, null otherwise.

      • existsInManifest

        boolean existsInManifest(Path path)
        Query if a file is available in the source control manifest (and is thus tracked by source control)
        Parameters:
        path - to a file or directory
        Returns:
        true if the path is a file that exists in the manifest, or a directory that contains files that are in the manifest.

      • addToSparseProfile

        void addToSparseProfile(Path path)
        Add a path that should, at some point in the future, be part of the working copy sparse profile.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to a source-control managed file or directory to be added

      • materialiseSparseProfile

        void materialiseSparseProfile()
        Update the working copy to include new paths added to the sparse profile. Paths added with addToSparseProfile will now be physically available on the filesystem.
